casebody.data:
Newark Express & Transportation Co., Inc., Libelant, v. Steam Tug PASSAIC; Newark & New York Towboat Co., Claimant-Appellee, and Erie R. Co., Respondent-Impleaded-Appellant. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 16, 1927. No. 298. Leo J. Curren, of New York City, for appellant. Foley & Martin, of New York City (Wm. J. Martin, of New York City, of counsel), for the Passaic. Macklin, Brown, Lenahan & Speer, of New York City (Gerald J. McKernan, of New York City, of counsel), for libelant-appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (21 F.[2d] 80) affirmed, with costs.
